scoringPlays.text: Jamari Staples 15 Yd pass from Lamar Jackson (Blanton Creque Kick)
Doni Dowling 9 Yd pass from Kurt Benkert (Sam Hayward Kick)
Olamide Zaccheaus 9 Yd pass from Kurt Benkert (Sam Hayward Kick)
Reggie Bonnafon 8 Yd pass from Lamar Jackson (Blanton Creque Kick)
Reggie Bonnafon 10 Yd pass from Lamar Jackson (Blanton Creque Kick)
Doni Dowling 4 Yd pass from Kurt Benkert (Kurt Benkert Pass to Albert Reid for Two-Point Conversion)
Jaylen Smith 29 Yd pass from Lamar Jackson (Lamar Jackson Pass to Jaylen Smith for Two-Point Conversion)

videos.headline: Punt return puts Virginia in the red zone
videos.description: Mason King punt for 41 yds, Daniel Hamm returns for 40 yds to the Lvile 8

videos.headline: Lamar Jackson explodes for 37-yard gain
videos.description: Lamar Jackson shows off his speed racing 37 yards for a first down.

videos.headline: L. Jackson pass to J. Staples for 15-yard TD
videos.description: Lamar Jackson finds Jamari Staples for the TD, giving Jackson his 35th total touchdown on the season

videos.headline: Virginia recovers Lamar Jackson fumble
videos.description: Louisville QB Lamar Jackson fumbles and the loose ball is recovered by Virginia in the Cardinals' territory.

videos.headline: Virginia QB Benkert throws 9-yard back shoulder TD pass
videos.description: Virginia QB Kurt Benkert throws a great back shoulder pass to Doni Dowling nine yards for the touchdown.

videos.headline: Louisville picks off Virginia
videos.description: Kurt Benkert's pass is intercepted by Louisville's Jaire Alexander in the second quarter.

videos.headline: Louisville returns INT deep into Virginia territory
videos.description: Virginia QB Kurt Benkert's pass is intercepted by Louisville's Jaire Alexander and returned 25 yards deep into Virginia territory.

videos.headline: Jackson gives Louisville lead with 10-yard TD strike
videos.description: Louisville QB Lamar Jackson throws his third touchdown pass against Virginia, this one a 10-yard laser to Reggie Bonnafon.

videos.headline: Virginia keeps drive alive on 4th down
videos.description: Kurt Benkert pass complete to Keeon Johnson for 30 yds to the Lvile 4 for a 1ST down

videos.headline: K. Benkert pass to Doni Dowling for 4-yard TD
videos.description: Kurt Benkert pass complete to Doni Dowling for 4 yds for a TD

videos.headline: Virginia takes the lead with late 2-point conversion
videos.description: After marching down the field and scoring a touchdown, Virginia gambles and goes for two to take a stunning lead on Louisville at 25-24.

videos.headline: Louisville keeps game alive with fourth down conversion
videos.description: Lamar Jackson pass complete to Cole Hikutini for 5 yds to the Virg 45 for a 1ST down

videos.headline: Louisville avoids massive upset with dramatic TD in final seconds
videos.description: With only 13 seconds left and trailing by a point, Louisville goes for it all when Lamar Jackson hits Jaylen Smith for a 29-yard touchdown to avoid a stunning upset from Virginia.

videos.headline: Virginia takes lead with great sequence of events
videos.description: After converting on a crucial 4th down, Virginia QB Kurt Benkert throws a 4-yard touchdown pass to Doni Dowling followed by a short pass to Albert Reid to give the Cavaliers the lead over Louisville.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Virginia takes lead with great sequence of events) 2016/10/29 ESHEET
